data.title: Nusli Wadia
data.meta_description: #712 Nusli Wadia on the 2024 Billionaires - Nusli Wadia is chairman of the Wadia Group, a cookies-to-textiles empire with roots in shipbuilding dating
data.text:
India’s Biscuit Barons See Sales Surge As Lockdown Boosts Demand For Comfort Foods

India's Ambani Family Tops Forbes List Of Asia's Richest Families

SINGAPORE (November 15, 2017) – India’s Ambani family tops 2017 Forbes list of Asia’s Richest Families for the first time with a net worth of US$44.8 billion. The collective wealth of Asia’s 50 richest families on the list are worth a record $699 billion, up 35% from last year. The [...]

Asia's Richest Families 2017: The Billion-Dollar Clans Ruling The Region

Collectively, the 50 families on the list are worth a record $699 billion, up by nearly $200 billion from last year.

Wealth Of India's 100 Richest Soars On Forbes List

SINGAPORE (October 5, 2017) – Despite India’s economic hiccups, tycoons on the 2017 Forbes India Rich List saw their wealth soar as their combined fortunes rose 26% to US$479 billion. The complete list is available here and www.forbesindia.com. The list can also be found in the October issue of Forbes [...]
